scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && tsc && cp package.json README.md ./dist
scripts.deploy:minor: npm i && git commit -am 'update package-lock.json' && npm version minor && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm i && git commit -am 'update package-lock.json' && npm version major && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.deploy:patch: npm i && git commit -am 'update package-lock.json' && npm version patch && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
